title: Oora Therinjikitten Lyrics Padikkathavan(1985)
stanzas:
yaedhu bandha paasam
ellaam veli vesam
kaasu panam vandhaal
nesam sila maasam

enveettu kannukutti
ennodu mallukatti
emmaarbil muttudhadi
kanmani en kanmani.

thee patta kaayathula
thael vandhu kottuthadi
kanmani en kanmani ..

naettru ivan yaeni
indru ivan niyaani
aala kara serthu
aadum indha thoni

sondhame oru vaanavil
andha varnam konja neram.
bandhame mullaanadhaal
indha nenjil oru baaram

panangaasa kanduputtaa
puli kooda pulla thinnum
kanmani en kanmani

adangaadha kaala onnu
adi maadaa ponadhadi
kanmani en kanmani..
